analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x3a806a4acee20b8bc987eb1f857a3b1c04f460f7.sol:
	Contract BiotheumToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x3a806a4acee20b8bc987eb1f857a3b1c04f460f7.sol#199-200)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x3a806a4acee20b8bc987eb1f857a3b1c04f460f7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.4 (/unique_contracts/0x3a806a4acee20b8bc987eb1f857a3b1c04f460f7.sol#3-4): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x3a806a4acee20b8bc987eb1f857a3b1c04f460f7.sol#67-69) is not in mixedCase
